topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5507f5fa6368725a8e970200#post_5507f5fa6368725a8e970200
Honestly I think Tri will be decent; not "11/10 Mountain Dew Doritos! GOTY" -IGN, but still decent.  My money is on objectively it'll be a 8.5/10; the thing that I hope for is that it will be popular enough to warrant a second or third season.

topics.body:
Over Halfway through Fresh Pretty Cure now.

Apparently they got an actual Manzai duo to voice themselves in the obligatory summer festival episode. (And Tarte's a fan of them somehow.)

Edit: Also, The duo doesn't seem to care that Tarte's a talking ferret.

One of them slapped evil masks off of Pretty cure, And the other's distracting the Nakewameke with Terrible jokes...I have no words for this.
